release.notes:
[Sleeve]
- Blue background

[Labels]
- Muted or faded light blue/pink marbled design.  Some other editions have darker/brighter colors. 
- Side A is light green background with marbled pink, side B is pink background with marbled light green.

[Copyright] 
- Labels: © 1981 I.R.S., Inc.
- Back cover sleeve: © 1981 International Record Syndicate, Inc.
- Spine: ℗ 1981 I.R.S., Inc.
- Inner sleeve: 1981 I.R.S., Inc. Printed in U.S.A."

[Songwriting]
- Labels and inner sleeve lyrics credit individual Written-By credits
- "All selections written by The Go-Go's" inner sleeve below the lyrics.

[Publishers]
- A1: Gotown Music/Plangent Visions Music
- A2, A4, A5, B4: Daddy-Oh Music/Gotown Music
- A3: Daddy-Oh Music/Gotown Music/Baby Oh Yeah Music
- B1, B2: Daddy-Oh Music
- B3: Gotown Music
- B5: Daddy-Oh Music/Punishment Tunes
- B6: Some Other Music ASCAP

[Runouts]
- "STERLING" is stamped, everything else including Terre Haute "T" is etched.
- Terre Haute "T" etched on Side B
- Santa Maria "S" etched on Side A

videos.title: The Go Gos-Beauty & The Beat(1981)(Vinyl Rip)
videos.description: Beauty and the Beat is the debut album from California new wave band the Go-Go's. Released in 1981 on the I.R.S. Records label, the album reached number one on Billboard's Top LPs & Tape chart in March 1982, bolstered by its two big Hot 100 hit singles: "
